information: The company T. KLEIN GMBH & CO. KG ARMATURENFABRIK UND METALLGIESSEREI, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, which operates in the Steel industry. It also operates in the Iron, special grade and pig iron, Aluminium and aluminium alloys, Foundries, aluminium, and Metals, precious and special industries. It is based in Hemer, Germany.
